subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Simple FM Sweep Radio Design/no_no.mp3 
  Uploaded by : urkel232002 <urkel23@...> 
  Description : "No-----No"   ---- Frank, i know you don't like the question and answer sessions, but this is an example of a real 2-way conversation verified.  They answer "No" and i repeat for confirmation "No" and than they say it again to confirm what i heard was right. Getting answers to questions that you ask is beneficial to this.  Of course i could get messages without saying a word, but isn't better to know when a message is coming so you can review that section of audio to find the answer.  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Simple%20FM%20Sweep%20Radio%20Design/no_no.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

urkel232002 <urkel23@...>
